means: （用说谎或欺骗以逃脱责备、困难等的）花招，遁词

sentence.Network_en: The party has predictably rejected the proposals as a subterfuge.
sentence.Network_cn: 不出所料，该党以这些提议是在耍花招为由而加以拒绝。

sentence.Network_en: Most people can see right through that type of subterfuge.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数人能一眼看透这种伎俩。

sentence.Network_en: European carping over the phraseology represented a mixture of hypocrisy and subterfuge.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧洲在措词上找岔子的做法既虚伪又狡诈.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根辅助记忆GRE单词 - 豆丁网 ... refugee n. 难民 subterfuge n. 遁词，借口，托词，狡计 confuse v. 使混乱（流到一起去混乱）.
assured的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... percolator 渗滤器, 咖啡渗滤壶 ... subterfuge 遁辞, 借口, 托辞.
...一自我”（alter ego）、“手段”（instrumentality）、“赝品”（sham）、“诡计”（subterfuge）、“工具”（tool）等等，不一而足。美国学者的统计显示，不同法庭使用过的表达此类涵义的不同语词多达.
词根辅助记忆GRE单词 - 豆丁网 ... refugee n. 难民 subterfuge n. 遁词，借口，托词，狡计 confuse v. 使混乱（流到一起去混乱）.

list.abs: no subterfuge , no camouflage , no alibis .没有借口，没有伪装，没有任何借口。
feelings of resentment and rage over this devious form of manipulation cannot surface in the child . . . because he does not see through the subterfuge .这个孩子对这种阴险手段不会表现出怨恨和愤怒的感情…因为他没有看穿他们的花招。

she sat with five men at a table under an elm tree that shaded them from the hot sun . her talent for subterfuge lay hidden behind her sweet , serene smile .当时她正和5个男人坐在一棵遮阳的榆树下桌子旁，她的脸上带着甜甜的、不露声色的微笑，把她会施诡计的本事藏了起来。

list.exp: 刑讯逼供这种卑劣的手段
list.abs: ...，解决证明不能的一种本能反应而已。因此，破解刑讯逼供屡禁不止难题的治本之策，在于调整证据的供需关系。刑讯逼供这种卑劣的手段（shoddy subterfuge）之所以有持久的生命力，其原因在于它可以避免有关证据的正式法律制度免于崩溃的危险。-John H. Langbein

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French, or from late Latin subterfugium, from Latin subterfugere 'escape secretly', from subter- 'beneath' + fugere 'flee'

entry.def: Subterfuge is a trick or a dishonest way of getting what you want.

example.ex: Most people can see right through that type of subterfuge...
example.tran: 大多数人能一眼看透这种伎俩。

example.ex: The party has predictably rejected the proposals as a subterfuge.
example.tran: 不出所料，该党以这些提议是在耍花招为由而加以拒绝。

means.word_mean: 1. something intended to misrepresent the true nature of an activity;

sentences.sentence: "he wasn't sick--it was just a subterfuge"
"the holding company was just a blind"

auth_sentence.content: You don't have to engage in lies and subterfuge.
auth_sentence.res_content: You don't have to engage in lies and subterfuge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You don't have to engage in lies and subterfuge.

auth_sentence.content: You attack from behind a subterfuge, while I do not.
auth_sentence.res_content: You attack from behind a subterfuge, while I do not.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You attack from behind a subterfuge, while I do not.

auth_sentence.content: He came home one night, with no attempt at subterfuge,...at three a.m.
auth_sentence.res_content: He came home one night, with no attempt at subterfuge,...at three a.m.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He came home one night, with no attempt at subterfuge,...at three a.m.

means.word_mean: (用说谎或欺骗以逃脱责备、困难等的)花招,遁词

sentences.en: the paltry subterfuge of an anonymous signature.
sentences.cn: 签署假名的卑鄙逃避手段
